entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @BrianKempGA Yet you AREN'T protecting the living Georgians! You opened the state prematurely. NO mandatory mask order. The facts are 💯% there. You are allowing our people...the living to die. Ga is still ranked top in the world with Covid-19 cases. Why, Poor LEADERSHIP! YOU! #FACTS
